grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 抑止【ヨクシ】check, checkmate, stave off, control, restraint, inhibit, deterrent, deterrence
抑圧【ヨクアツ】check, restraint, oppression, suppression
kun reading compounds: 抑える【おさえる】to keep within limits (e.g. spending), to restrain (e.g. emotions), to control, to curb, to hold in check, to hold back (e.g. an enemy), to check, to curb, to contain, to quell, to subdue, to suppress, to repress
